Posted By: Avatar_of_Wurms (10/13/2010 1:35:24 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Really? I must be dreaming. Steel Overseer is in the same set, you know. And right before another artifact block. ... And would you really want to get hit by Grindclock up to an additional 4 times? How about Lux Cannon?   
  
And don't forget Myr Galvanizer- you can make a pretty hefty amount of mana with all the mana producing myr. Of course, with copies of galvanizer you can go infinite anyway and not have to leave the set... I'll have a few things to say about that once it hits gatherer.  
  
At least the permanents with proliferate cost 4 mana to activate in addition to tapping. That would just be absurd otherwise.  
  
Still, reprinting this (especially before scars) was a really *bad*  idea.
posts.html:

And don't forget Myr Galvanizer- you can make a pretty hefty amount of mana with all the mana producing myr. Of course, with copies of galvanizer you can go infinite anyway and not have to leave the set... I'll have a few things to say about that once it hits gatherer.

At least the permanents with proliferate cost 4 mana to activate in addition to tapping. That would just be absurd otherwise.
